attributes.action: Request that the FA ban and sack Rob Styles from refereeing any English league football games.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Rob Styles has made many dubious decisions whilst being a football referee. He is disliked by many football fans and managers. This petition is aimed to sack/ban Rob Styles from refereeing any English Football League games as his decisions have been seen as bias and match changing (for the worse)

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
